item.description: HIGHLIGHTS: *Meet Boston’s friendly, fun, attractive and upscale crowd (21-35 age group) * Hosted by Miss Massachusetts 2012 accompanied by other Miss USA title holders. *Two SYNERGY DJ’s spinning Pop, Euro House, Arabic House, Top 40′s mash up and Hip-Hop. Say no to 30-second DJs playing the same old songs from the radio!! Please check below to hear some of the music you will get to hear at the event. * Professional photographers to capture your best moments throughout the night and on the red carpet *Complimentary appetizers from 10:00-11:00 PM * Fashion exhibit sponsored by Avanti Salon, Boston Platinum and The Ultimate Womans Apparel *Did we mention you will get to meet our Golden girls and Top 3 Timeless Bond Girl Contestants? *An exclusive VIP bar for VIP ticket holders *Live projection of midnight countdown from Times Square *Outstanding decor, lights and sound *Prizes awarded to the best James Bond look alike and female spy *Complimentary party favors *Many other surprises and giveaways in store This year surround yourself with opulence and splendor of TIMELESS 2012, the one and only event that will stand out from the rest of the “New Years Eve Parties” in Boston. http://bostonnewyears.... http://www.synergynye.... http://timeless12.eve.... http://contest.synerg.... http://www.thesynergy....
item.name: 4th Annual Timeless - Boston's Most Exclusive New Years Eve Gala
